mapper.insert: insert into bj_system_article_temp(gatherTime, carType, carFirm, articleType, articleWebsite, articleUrl, articleAuthor, articleTime, articleTitle, articleContent, createdBy, createdTime,updatedBy,updatedTime) values(#{gatherTime}, #{carType}, #{carFirm}, #{articleType}, #{articleWebsite}, #{articleUrl}, #{articleAuthor}, #{articleTime}, #{articleTitle}, #{articleContent}, #{createdBy}, #{createdTime},#{updatedBy},#{updatedTime});
mapper.select: select * from bj_system_issue_temp order by id desc;
